isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - OPERATION - WINDSHIELD WASHERS WITH HEADER MOUNTED CONTROLS

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WASHERS WITH HEADER MOUNTED CONTROLS
svcproc.para: The control for the windshield washers is a push button switch that works independently of the wiper controls and is mounted on the wiper/washer control panel between the two wiper control knobs.
Operate the washers on both wiper arms simultaneously by pressing the washer switch button. The washers will continue to operate as long as the button is pressed.
